pkgmetadata.longdescription: Analysis of Multivariate Event Times // Implementation of various statistical models for multivariate event history data. Including multivariate cumulative incidence models, and bivariate random effects probit models (Liability models). Also contains two-stage binomial modelling that can do pairwise odds-ratio dependence modelling based marginal logistic regression models. This is an alternative to the alternating logistic regression approach (ALR).
